name: AccuRadio
0:
”Alexa, OPEN AccuRadio”
”Alexa, PLAY Magic Sunny Lite Mix FROM AccuRadio”
”Alexa, PLAY Country FROM AccuRadio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: accuradio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
AccuRadio is always 100% free and offers 900+ human-curated music channels with incredible variety, and unlimited skips. 

Choose from more than 50 different genres of music: rock, pop, jazz, country, classical, electronic, holidays, alternative, comedy, and more. Each channel is hand-crafted and sounds great all day long. Listen now!

Genres available:

• HitKast
• Today's New Country
• Classic Rocktopia
• Listeners' Top 100: Lite Hits
• Jazz
• Bluegrass
• Alternative Rock Classics
• Smooth Jazz
• Textures Breeze
• AccuClassical
• Classical Relaxation
• 1950s Oldies
• Rock n Stereo
• Classical Christmas
• Lighter Sunny Hits Mix
• Christian Contemporary
• Electronic
• Blues
• Reggae Christmas
• Celtic Rock
• Folk Traditions
• Comedy
• Latin Hits
• Pop Standards Hits
• 1960s Broadway
• Global Punks
• Punk and Hardcore
• BossaNovaville
• K-Pop
• Native American
• Hawaiian
• Male Cabaret
• Female Cabaret

And more! Over 900 channels to discover!
